post.description: Creates a new API integration with confidential client credentials. The credentials are shown only once.

get.description: Returns a list of all API integrations. Client secrets are not included.

delete.description: Deletes an API integration and revokes all access. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: Returns a list of all appointments.
Returns an appointment by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes an appointment by its unique ID. This will also delete all associated visits and visit items.

get.summary: List all visits for an appointment
get.description: Returns all visits for a specific appointment.
Returns a list of all departments.
Returns a department by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a department by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all persons in a department
get.description: Returns all persons that are members of the given department.
Returns a list of all item assignment histories.

post.description: Creates a new item assignment history.

get.description: Returns a item assignment history by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing item assignment history.

delete.description: Deletes a item assignment history by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all items.
Returns a item by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a item by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all assignments for a item
get.description: Returns all assignment histories for a specific item.

get.summary: List all maintenances for a item
get.description: Returns all maintenance records for a specific item.
Returns a list of all maintenance records.
Returns a maintenance record by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a maintenance record by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all maintenanceTypes.
Returns a maintenanceType by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a maintenanceType by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all manufacturers.
Returns a manufacturer by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a manufacturer by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all products for a manufacturer
get.description: Returns all products for a specific manufacturer.
Returns a list of all orders.
Returns an order by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes an order by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all order items.

get.summary: List order items by order ID
get.description: Returns a list of order items for a specific order.
Returns an order item by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes an order item by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all persons.
Returns a single person by their unique ID.

get.summary: List all items assigned to a person
get.description: Returns all items assigned to a specific person.
Returns a list of all products.
Returns a product by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a product by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all variants for a product
get.description: Returns all variants for a specific product.
Returns a list of all productTypes.
Returns a productType by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a productType by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all storage locations.
Returns a storage location by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a storage location by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all items for a storage location
get.description: Returns all items assigned to a storage location.
Returns a list of all tenants in the system. Only accessible to system administrators.

post.description: Creates a new tenant with a unique realm and name. Only accessible to system administrators.

get.description: Returns a tenant by its unique ID. Only accessible to system administrators.

put.description: Updates an existing tenant. Only accessible to system administrators.

delete.description: Deletes a tenant by its unique ID. Only accessible to system administrators.

get.description: Returns a list of all users.
Returns a user by its unique ID.
Returns a list of all variants.
Returns a variant by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a variant by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all items for a variant
get.description: Returns all items for a specific variant.
Returns a list of all visit items.

get.summary: List visit items by visit ID
get.description: Returns a list of visit items for a specific visit.
Returns a visit item by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a visit item by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all visits.

post.description: Creates a new visit. A person can only have one visit per appointment.

get.description: Returns a visit by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing visit. The combination of appointment and person must remain unique.

delete.description: Deletes a visit by its unique ID. This will also delete all associated visit items.

get.summary: List all items for a visit
get.description: Returns all items associated with a specific visit.
